detail_desc: Short, fitted dress in ribbed cotton jersey with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed cotton jersey with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.

Short dress in a softly draping, patterned viscose weave with a grandad collar and wrapover top with concealed press-studs. Flounces at the front, long sleeves, a seam at the waist with smocking at the back and pleats at the front, and an asymmetric hem. Unlined.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. High waist with wide elastication and a drawstring, and side pockets. The polyester content of the shorts is recycled.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. High waist with wide elastication and a drawstring, and side pockets. The polyester content of the shorts is recycled.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. High waist with wide elastication and a drawstring, and side pockets. The polyester content of the shorts is recycled.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a high, elasticated drawstring waist, welt side pockets and wide legs with slits.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a high, elasticated drawstring waist, welt side pockets and wide legs with slits.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a high, elasticated drawstring waist, welt side pockets and wide legs with slits.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a high, elasticated drawstring waist, welt side pockets and wide legs with slits.
Seven thin metal hoop earrings with letter pendants. Diameter 3 cm.

Short, sleeveless dress in an airy weave with asymmetric flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders. Elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist and a wide flounce at the hem. Lined skirt.

Short, sleeveless dress in an airy weave with asymmetric flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders. Elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist and a wide flounce at the hem. Lined skirt.
Metal hoop earrings decorated with plastic beads. Diameter 3 cm.
Set with six pairs of earrings and two ear cuffs. One pair of earrings is decorated with a glass sparkly stone, and another pair has a pearly plastic bead. Size from 0.4 cm to 3 cm.
Metal rings in various designs. Three decorated with sparkly glass beads.
Necklace with five metal chains in various designs, one with a round pendant. Adjustable length 37-44 cm.
Necklace with five metal chains in various designs, one with a round pendant. Adjustable length 37-44 cm.
A pair of earrings in metal decorated with sparkly glass stones and pearly plastic beads. Together the earrings spell the word LOVE. Length 4 cm.
Metal hoop earrings decorated with sparkly glass stones.
A pair of long metal chain earrings. Length 6.5 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with worn details. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and slightly shorter, skinny legs.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with worn details. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and slightly shorter, skinny legs.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with worn details. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and slightly shorter, skinny legs.

Fitted puffer jacket in woven fabric with a zip down the front and lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Concealed, elasticated drawstring at the waist, zipped front pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with a regular waist, pleats at the top and a zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening. Diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets and wide, straight legs with creases.

Lightly padded parka in cotton twill with a high collar and lined hood with a folding trim around the edge. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, handwarmer pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud, and flap front pockets with a press-stud. Drawstring at the waist and a tab with a press-stud at the cuffs. Quilted lining.

Lightly padded parka in cotton twill with a high collar and lined hood with a folding trim around the edge. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, handwarmer pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud, and flap front pockets with a press-stud. Drawstring at the waist and a tab with a press-stud at the cuffs. Quilted lining.

Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets.

Shorts in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with wide, elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, and pockets in the side seams. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.

Blouse in airy, crinkled chiffon with a pleated stand-up collar and V-shaped opening at the front with ties at the top. 3/4-length sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs, a narrow elasticated seam at the waist and a peplum.

Blouse in airy, crinkled chiffon with a pleated stand-up collar and V-shaped opening at the front with ties at the top. 3/4-length sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs, a narrow elasticated seam at the waist and a peplum.
Cropped blouse in an airy linen and cotton weave with a deep V-neck and sewn-in tie detail at the front. Short, raglan puff sleeves with elastication and a small frill trim at the hems.
Cropped blouse in an airy linen and cotton weave with a deep V-neck and sewn-in tie detail at the front. Short, raglan puff sleeves with elastication and a small frill trim at the hems.
Turtleneck top in softly draping, narrow-ribbed jersey with a sheen. Decorative metal buttons on one shoulder and long sleeves.

Cropped sleeveless top in a cotton weave with a broderie anglaise flounce at the front. Gentle V-neck, wide shoulder straps and wide ties at the back. Lined.

Cropped top in a crinkled cotton weave. Square neckline with covered elastication, short puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and hems, and smocking and a small frill trim at the hem. Unlined.

Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and jacquard-patterned details. Seamless.

Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and rounded hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.

Lightweight windbreaker in a patterned weave with a stand-up collar, lined, detachable hood with an elasticated edge, and zip down the front with a chin guard. Welt front pockets, adjustable elastication at the waist and elasticated cuffs. Lined. The polyester content of the jacket is recycled.
Biker jacket in imitation leather. Notch lapels with decorative press-studs, a diagonal zip down the front and zipped front pockets. Lined.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit merino wool with a ribbed collar, button placket with corozo nut buttons and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a deep V-neck, wrapover front with a decorative frill trim, and a small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam and a detachable tie-belt at the waist and wide, full-length legs. Jersey lining at the top. The polyester content of the jumpsuit is partly recycled.
Bandeau bras in soft cotton jersey with side support and lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. No fasteners.
Shorts in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and slim legs.
